titles.title: Public Buildings Savings and Reform Act of 2013
To amend title 40, United States Code, to improve the functioning and management of the Public Buildings Service.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
